examples: Artabotrys zeylanicus var. kottavasalianus J.Mathew & K.V.George, Int. J. Pl. Anim. Environm. Sci. 3(4): 153. 2013
notes: The names Artabotrys zeylanicus var. kottavasalianus and Dendrobium kallarense have Jose as the first author, and the name Dendrobium georgei have Mathew as the author
